action.subtitle:
OMV: Open Market Value is the cost of a vehicle imported into Singapore.

ARF: Additional Registration Fees is a tax imposed when the vehicle is registered in Singapore.

QP Paid: Quota Premium Paid refers to the price of the Certificate of Entitlement (COE) that has been paid during the registration of the vehicle.
action.title: What are OMV, ARF, QP Paid?
